examples: I need to buy a new pair of boots for hiking.
The cowboy wore tall, leather boots with pointed toes.
Necesito comprar un par de botas nuevas para hacer senderismo.
El vaquero llevaba botas altas de cuero con puntas afiladas.

suggested: The cowboy put on his boots before heading out to the rodeo.
We had to open the trunk of the car to get our boots.
I had to use my boot to kick the door open.
The soldiers polished their boots until they shone.
She wore her boots to protect her feet during the hike.
She paired her dress with a cute pair of ankle boots.
The boots had good grip for hiking in the mountains.
